title: Drawing, "Frieze", 1775–80
medium:
Pen and black ink, traces of black chalk
Support: white laid paper laid down on white laid paper
inscribed: signed in pen and brown ink (according to Rudolf Berliner, by Delafosse's hand) at bottom margin of mount: J. Ch. Delafosse Ex Musaeo C.N. Varin frise
provenance: C.N. Varin (?); L on Decloux (acquired by Decloux after l906)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: The right half is shown: rinceaux flanking a shell, half of which is shown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Frieze", 1775–80.
1775–80. Pen and black ink, traces of black chalk
Support: white laid paper laid down on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-47.
